sub_title: The Conscious Translator 🌱 I help vegan brands and sustainable marketing agencies to reach a global audience and drive positive change by translating their French or Dutch copy into fluent, native English!
summary:
Are you a marketing manager who needs to create international campaigns to raise awareness for their sustainable business, and reach an international audience of 1.2 billion internet users worldwide? 
Are you a campaigner who wants to change the world by raising awareness for your climate-friendly initiative among this global audience of English-speakers?

Have you translated your marketing materials into English in-house, but you're worried that you're not really connecting with your English-speaking audience as the campaign isn't delivering the expected results?

With over 16 years of experience in marketing translation, I have helped hundreds of international organisations like yours, including a major marketing agency and a B Corp-certified drinks company, to boost their global reputation. If you want to expand your reach globally, I'm your go-to marketing translation specialist! 

I provide fluent English translations that will:

➤ Increase your visibility & help you stand out from the crowd. 

➤ Communicate your true value! Sloppy translations give your readers a bad impression. Boost your credibility with professional translations from a native English speaker, and see your positive impact grow!

➤ Maintain the unique tone of voice your readers are accustomed to, with translations that sound like they were written in English!

You can rely on me because:

➤ We share the same values. You're a mission-driven changemaker, and I help brands and organisations that are striving for positive change, putting people & planet first.

➤ You want someone you can trust. With over 16 years' experience providing marketing translations to clients like you, I'll meet or even exceed your expectations. I'm a member of two associations for language professionals with testimonials from satisfied clients and I keep my skills up-to-date by attending courses and conferences (see courses section of my profile for details).

➤ You want direct contact with your translator. I can answer your questions quickly and efficiently!

Success story: 
I helped a drinks company to communicate its B Corp certification and impact to English-speaking readers. In turn, this boosted trust and credibility among their customers and led to more sales to international customers.

I can do the same for you!

DM me today (in English, French or Dutch) to find out how I can help you with fluent English translations that will boost your visibility and give your message a global reach!

profile_positions.description:
I help vegan brands, B Corps, sustainable marketing agencies, environmental non-profits, social enterprises & cultural institutions in Belgium, the Netherlands, France, Luxembourg & Switzerland to reach a global audience by translating and transcreating their French & Dutch copy into idiomatic English! 

With over 16 years' experience carrying out marketing & cultural translations from French & Dutch into English, you can rely on me to help you reach a global audience. If your English content needs a finishing touch I can do that too, so that you can really connect with your readers.

You want someone you can trust. To keep up with developments in my field, I've been a member of the Luxembourg Translators Association (ALTI) since 2011 & the Society of English-language professionals in the Netherlands since 2016.

I can help you by translating or reviewing your:

-Newsletters
-Press releases
-Websites
-Brochures
-Social media posts
-Educational materials
-Leaflets
-Articles

Success stories & outcomes for my clients:

Marketing translation of press releases for a B Corp-certified drinks company, 4,000 words, French to English. Outcome: I helped the company to communicate their B Corp certification & impact to English-speaking readers. In turn, this boosted trust & credibility among their customers.

Marketing translation of brochures, packaging & website content for a vegan cosmetics & food supplements company, 11,000 words, Dutch to English. Outcome: I helped the company to project a professional image with idiomatic translations, which translated into more sales to English-speaking customers.

If you're ready to work with me and see how I can do the same for you, then DM me today to discuss your project!

---------
I also provide sworn translations of official documents from French, Dutch & Italian to English for clients in Luxembourg. These include:

-Birth certificates (French, Dutch & Italian to English)
-University diplomas (French, Dutch & Italian to English)
